title: Game loading with new client causing discord audio + comp to LAG momentarily.
body:
https://clips.twitch.tv/summit1g/AnnoyingHareBCouch

This is an example of summit1g's computer doing the same as mine, where the audio and FPS lag spikes when loading into a game. For me it's not EVERY game where this happens mostly the first game of the day or random.

Any ideas as is to why?

replies.body: iv had the same issue where my discord will lag when i talk to people but in game is fine and my ping is fine as well

This may be a connection issue that's slow to download assets and communicate with the game server, which is why you see a black screen for a bit before it loads.  If you have a similar issue then I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix it up.  I hope that helps!

Our tech team will help you individually through this, and will reply back asap!
